events.message: We have received the application from Jane Doe for the Software Engineer position. She has over 5 years of experience in backend development.
The application for the Software Engineer role has been categorized under Engineering based on the candidateâ€™s resume and skills.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the recruitment process for this engineering candidate.
Initial phone screening was conducted with the candidate. She demonstrated strong knowledge of software development best practices.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about proceeding to the technical interview stage.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th. The interview will cover backend development and system design topics.
